author: edwint
title: World of Pirates
description: Gamers want to be involved in every aspect of the game they love to play, to have impact in society and to control their in-game assets. [1]
solution: With our F2P & P2E game, we help players to make an impact in the world by donating to charity projects and earn NFTs to gain revenue.
experience: We are a team of 5 with 80 years of experience in infrastructure and web development, gaming & blockchain - 3 of us are Plutus Pioneers.
